author: Riva Gold
title: Russia Funds Draw Money, Despite Sanctions and Syria
text: Investors have continued to pour money into Russian stocks and bonds this week, despite fresh sanctions and escalating tensions between Washington and Moscow over Syria that have rocked the countryâ€™s markets. Net flows to Russian equity funds amounted to 0.9% of assets under management in the week through Wednesday, according to data from EPFR Global and   British Stocks are Having Their Moment in the Sun Next Stocks to Watch: JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup, Wells Fargo, Broadcom, Qualcomm, Amazon, Tesla, Netflix
